Author: mercadinaut#9107
Content:
@ca333 - some feedback on AtomicDEX

I have been using the Atomic DEX app for a while now and have made a number of successful trades. It is really easy to use and the UX is generally fantastic. I do have one important piece of feedback on the trading interface, however.

You need to add the balance of each holding to the main trade screen when a sell or buy order is entered on the trading screens. Currently nothing is shown (at least on my version) when you select a particular coin to sell. If you don't want to trade your max balance, then as a user you are forced to go back to the previous screen and try to remember the balance and then enter ho much you want to trade. The balance of each coin account should be shown on the actual trade screen (& not just on the pop up window for coin selection). I have found that when demonstrating the App to others it is really easy to lose track of this information between screens. Other crypto wallet apps provide this information. You also provide it on the App's withdrawal screen. Ideally you should also show the equivalent value in USD.

I have also provided this feedback on the AtomicDEX website. Hopefully you will pick up this minor but important UX change. I can share a graphic of the suggested change if required.

Author: Jimm B.#9993
Content: @mercadinaut If you want to trade the maximum amount, you can just press max.

Author: Jimm B.#9993
Content: Sorry, I read wrong.  Nevertheless, you can find out the maximum by pressing Max.  nothing to remember.

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: What language  do you have set? IIRC in some languages the max button was out of screen. Post your phone model also, if you can't see max button might be a UI bug on a certain phone.

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: You can also see balance when selecting the coin, don't have to go back to main page.

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: Please use https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/atomicdex/issues for bug reports and feature requests.

Content: @Oszy   OK - will do & will provide specifics on my phone model. The language set is English & yes I can see the "Max" button. I appreciate that the coin balance is on the previous screen and on the pop-up when you select the coin. My suggestion is to improve the UX as I have encountered this problem several times. Every other exchange I have used displays your balance on screen before you make a trade.

Author: saturday#4156
Content: where can I find the trading history in atomicdex?

Author: saturday#4156
Content: I want to know kmd-dex trading history.

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
other than the makers publishing the details themselves, the only way to find a trading history is to have a mm2 node always online
and observing the orders that are broadcast and checking the involved blockchains if a disappeared order has been fulfilled

such a system is not implemenmted yet and is a huge undertaking (servers+storage and man hours to code), I don't know if the team is interested in implementing it

Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: Fee addresses x 777

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: ^ should give the number of trades, but not the exact details of a trade like the volume and price?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: and some failed swaps may also pay the dex fee

Author: polycryptoblog#1173

Content:

I would like to know how the conversion of mnemonic (seed / 12 word) is converted to addresses?

My version of ios 13.2

Content:
It may use a different derivation path? 
seed created in atomicdex & agama are 100% compatible with atomicdex
make sure you don't have extra space at the end / type it don't copy/paste see if it works that way

Author: AndrewVV#0430
Content:
I tried creating a new account. I also tried to open my new seed in the Agama wallet. I see the same addresses. How do I know the relevant  derivation path?

My derivation paths
BTC: m/44'/0'/0'/0/0
ETH: m/44'/60'/0'/0/0

Author: SHossain#0007
Content:
you can't use bip39/bip44 or similar seed phrase in atomicDEX or Agama. 
just create a new seed from atomicDEX or Agama and both of them will be interchangeable

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: in Agama and atomicDEX, one seed phrase will always generate one address. no derivation path, no other address
